alert.note: Alert for Geneva (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Geneva, northwestern Jackson, central Walton, Holmes and northern Washington Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 800 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Slocomb to 7 miles east of Crestview. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chipley, Graceville, De Funiak Springs, Bonifay, Hartford, Slocomb, Eglin Air Force Base, Union, Liberty, Malvern, Cottondale, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Esto, Westville, Noma, Black, Oakwood Hills, Cluster Springs and Whitehead Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
